channel.title: New Project Look here (please)
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt]LSC V-1.0.0 Release![/size][/center] [center][img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/584/screenie1vk1.png[/img] [size=8pt](ignore the "R" in the middle i was thinking about my name :rolleyes: *stuiped*)[/size] [img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/3536/screenie2ek3.png[/img][/center]
[center]Version: Lagex-Script-Control V-1.0.0 BETA. [/center]
[center][size=30pt][b][url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9PRA1AXG]DOWNLOAD[/url][/b] [i](20.0 KB (20,480 bytes)[/i][/size][/center]
If you downloaded Please post also suggestions for V1.1.0 Would be very appreciated. :)
INFO:
[i]What is it?[/i]: LSC is a scripting control used to script "VBScript" Witch is VERY Easy. This version of LSC is currently at beta stage and will be relased shortly :D.
[i]Hmmmm I Think ive seen it before?[/i]: No, You haven't. ::) But, You may think it is simmiler to scar. its not. its using a different language, different controls. and its NOT used for RS Cheating. it is used for making really basic scripts to do a whole bunch of things.
[i]What if i do not know how to use it?[/i]: I Will provide you with some VBScript Tutorials :D
[i]Can i write a .exe of my script.[/i]No. Safe and simple. This is to stop anything being made harm your computer ^.^.
[i]Who made LSC?[/i]: 110% Percent to me. I Had no team what so ever. :D. (i still love you guys :-*)
[i]What are you planning to do with this?[/i] Well when people master VB6Script of LSC i will release a JavaScript of LSC :D so you can all make your own cool effects :P.
If you want any tutorials/hepl with LSC please vist here :http://lagex.ulmb.com/forums/index.php/board,48.0.html

item.title: New Project Look here (please)
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

This isn’t C/Java portal, What do you expect? Also I thought functions in VB had to return something or else you would just declare it a sub, yes?

Read full topic

item.title: New Project Look here (please)
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

anti-mac:

Ewwww vb…

VBScript is not that hard to learn and you can create really cool effects with it

Portal:

I was thinking the same thing…because your returning the value of Add, in vb you never use returns that i know of. Otherwise you would have to declare the function as int…which again i dont think you can do

Function Add(a, b)
    Return a + b
End Function

Did alot of pointless crap, I know above works or you might need ( ).
[/quote]

Wouldnt that be “Add = a + b” ?[/quote][quote=“thiefmn6092, post:2, topic:51563”] Function Add(a, b) Return a + b End Function

Did alot of pointless crap, I know above works or you might need ( ). :-P[/quote]
Lets not talk about the script i made ok :o

Read full topic

If you downloaded Please post also suggestions for V1.1.0 Would be very appreciated.

INFO:

What is it?: LSC is a scripting control used to script “VBScript” Witch is VERY Easy. This version of LSC is currently at beta stage and will be relased shortly :D.

Hmmmm I Think ive seen it before?: No, You haven’t. : But, You may think it is simmiler to scar. its not. its using a different language, different controls. and its NOT used for RS Cheating. it is used for making really basic scripts to do a whole bunch of things.

What if i do not know how to use it?: I Will provide you with some VBScript Tutorials

Can i write a .exe of my script.No. Safe and simple. This is to stop anything being made harm your computer ^.^.

Who made LSC?: 110% Percent to me. I Had no team what so ever. :D. (i still love you guys :-*)

What are you planning to do with this? Well when people master VB6Script of LSC i will release a JavaScript of LSC so you can all make your own cool effects :P.

If you want any tutorials/hepl with LSC please vist here :http://lagex.ulmb.com/forums/index.php/board,48.0.html
